title: Theatre of Madness psychedelic poster
content: Really reminds me of a font from Fontalicious that I can't quite place... Superbly, maybe? Either way, I can't get onto Fontalicious's site right now anyway, so....
author: wizard7926

comments.content: [Superfly](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000815/http:/www.dafont.com/en/font.php?file=superfly) is similar in style, but not identical

You can ask the creator yourself!   
   
 [http://www.victormoscoso.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000815/http:/www.victormoscoso.com/)   
   
I believe he said he started with Playbill and freehanded it from there . . .   
   
Good Luck,   
Stuart :D
